articles.content: The American League, on the strength of back-to-back home runs by Giancarlo Stanton and Byron Buxton, continued its All-Star Game dominance on Tuesday night at Dodger Stadium. The AL won the 2022 MLB… [+6474 chars]

articles.author: Rob Bolton and Mike Glasscott, PGATOUR.COM
articles.title: Pick 'Em Preview: 3M Open - PGA TOUR
articles.description: The 3M Open drops at a time when none of the most notable in its field is playing its best. It’s also not a replicate of the Mexico Open at Vidanta that had an overwhelming favorite in Jon Rahm to deliver on the most challenging task – victory.
